cz.ive.trigger
Class DelegationProcessSuitability

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.messaging.SyncHook
      cz.ive.trigger.DelegationProcessSuitability
All Implemented Interfaces:
Hook, OntologyToken, Trigger, java.io.Serializable
public class DelegationProcessSuitability
extends SyncHook
implements Trigger, java.io.Serializable

Suitability for all delegated processes. The suitability is true when there is a genius registrated to the template of an actual process and the area in the given sources is the same the genius registered with.

Author:
honza
See Also:
